channel.title: Full Tut To Making A Server Online
channel.description:
Difficulty 5/10
Requirments - Router or modem and unblocked port 43594, call up ur isp
Step 1 Ok download a source located on the runescape server downloads. This tutorial is only for 508 and 317 based deob's only sorry.
Step2. PORTFORWARDING SERVER ~ MOST HARDEST PART!! Ok, Visit www.portforward.com select your router or modem. Follow it's tutorial. Make the ports 43594 tcp ucp any If that does not work, please use utorrent and firewall. (i'll post a tut on that later)
Step3. After you have portforwarded Edit ur run.bat where it says jdk1.6.0_something or jre, change that to ur jdk version. Make sure to change the program files, some computers have program files (x86)
Step4. Run server
Step5. Download a client that matches your deob and login with your external ip ~ DO NOT MAKE A NO-IP IT INCREAES LAG BECAUSE THE SERVERS ARE OVERLOADED!!!
Step6. Now ur online!!! if ur not post a comment i'll get on team viewer and help you. Now all you need to learn is how to code witch is harder then this. Java and html Not that hard all there could be sum tuts
FAQ Q. Why wont your server go on? A. Did you portforward with your modem router u torrent and firewall?

item.title: Full Tut To Making A Server Online
item.dc:creator: @Cody_The_Coder Cody The Coder
item.description:
@Cody_The_Coder wrote:

Difficulty 5/10

Requirments - Router or modem and unblocked port 43594, call up ur isp

Step 1
Ok download a source located on the runescape server downloads.
This tutorial is only for 508 and 317 based deob’s only sorry.

Step2.
PORTFORWARDING SERVER ~ MOST HARDEST PART!!
Ok, Visit www.portforward.com select your router or modem. Follow it’s tutorial. Make the ports 43594 tcp ucp any
If that does not work, please use utorrent and firewall. (i’ll post a tut on that later)

Step3.
After you have portforwarded Edit ur run.bat where it says jdk1.6.0_something or jre, change that to ur jdk version. Make sure to change the program files, some computers have program files (x86)

Step4.
Run server

Step5.
Download a client that matches your deob and login with your external ip ~ DO NOT MAKE A NO-IP IT INCREAES LAG BECAUSE THE SERVERS ARE OVERLOADED!!!

Step6.
Now ur online!!! if ur not post a comment i’ll get on team viewer and help you.
Now all you need to learn is how to code witch is harder then this.
Java and html
Not that hard all there could be sum tuts

FAQ
Q. Why wont your server go on?
A. Did you portforward with your modem router u torrent and firewall?

Read full topic
